lever.additional:
Together with the team, you will be the part of Indonesia development and creating a direct impact on people’s lives. We are expanding very fast from Sabang to Merauke, from strategic planning in Jakarta to building cities all around Indonesia. We'll give you the freedom to determine your own direction and deliver in your own style. Outperform our expectations and you'll move forward faster than you ever thought possible.

Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description: As a District Operations Manager, you will be working closely with our drivers, both motorcycle and car driver-based service, to handle day-to-day operational activities, create the strategy related to driver service, engagement and customer satisfaction in specific districts. This position will be closely working with District Head and Regional Operations Head.
lever.descriptionPlain: As a District Operations Manager, you will be working closely with our drivers, both motorcycle and car driver-based service, to handle day-to-day operational activities, create the strategy related to driver service, engagement and customer satisfaction in specific districts. This position will be closely working with District Head and Regional Operations Head.

lists.content:
• Responsible for all driver operations related :
  • a. Overall acquisition process ( from lead up to onboarding process )
  • b. Overall engagement activities ( outreach , bi weekly meet up, loyalty & retention program, products related to it )
  • c. Driver walk in center related operations and metrics from handling time, queueing time, quality of service, layout and facilities
  • d. B2B relationship with our fleet partner
  • Ensure the quantity and distribution of supply is sufficient to achieve business goals
  • Work together with Security ops team to manage condusivity in the districts
  • Ensure the quality of supply is sufficient to prevent safety & security issues
  • Proactively do any problem solving related to supply issues

• Able to relocate to the respected city
  • Minimum of bachelor’s degree with multi-years of exposure experiences in reputable multinational companies or top local companies.
  • Exposure to one of these industries: FMCG, Transportation, Logistic, Distribution, Airlines,Mining
  • Having more than 5 years managerial experiences with minimum 10 years of working experience
  • Able to handle walk-in channel, face to face service, and a service area (contact centre, email etc)
  • Procient in English
  • Analytical, proactive, structure-thinker, and a problem solv
